titleStmt.title: A discourse wherein is held forth the opposition of the doctrine, worship, and practices of the Roman church to the nature, designs and characters of the Christian faith by Gilbert Burnet.
Mystery of iniquity unveiled
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Originally published as: The mystery of iniquity unveiled, 1673.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
